verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Usione ninaimba
nafurahia naburudika,
maisha yangu mazuri
amani tele moyoni mwangu.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
(Ni Mungu) anipaye nguvu,
(ni Mungu) anipaye afya.
(Ni Mungu) ananiongoza,
(ni Mungu) msaada wangu.
Jawabu langu la moyo wangu
ndiye Mungu Baba
anilindaye mimi.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jawabu la moyo
wangu ni Mungu
shahidi yangu
nikiwa na matatizo
anijalia faraja.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nimezungukazunguka,
maisha yangu hafifu.
Nikamrudia Mungu,
sasa ninatabasamu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Njia zake ndiyo njia,
mapendo yake makuu.
Kanipa heshima kubwa,
mbele ya adui zangu.
